q: Do you deliver across India?
a: Yes, we deliver across India. Delivery speed varies by location.

q: Are you available 24/7?
a: Yes, our service is available 24/7.

q: How do I upload a prescription?
a: Use the 'Upload Prescription' option on the site. Prescription-only medicines require a valid Rx.

q: What is EverMeds?
a: EverMeds is an online pharmacy offering genuine medicines and healthcare essentials.

q: How does EverMeds work?
a: Search products, upload prescription if required, place the order, and get delivery at your address.

q: What payment methods do you accept?
a: We accept UPI, major wallets, and cards like Visa and RuPay. Final options appear at checkout.

q: How can I track my order?
a: Use the 'Track Order' link from the main menu to see real-time status.

q: Can I place an order by phone?
a: Yes, you can place an order via the Contact page using the call support option.

q: What if a medicine is not listed?
a: Use 'Request a Medicine' and we will try to arrange it for you.

q: Are the medicines genuine?
a: Yes. We source from trusted suppliers and manufacturers. Products are 100% genuine.

q: Do you stock top pharma brands?
a: Yes, we work with leading pharma brands. Availability may vary by product.

q: Where can I see product details?
a: Open any product page to view price, dosage, manufacturer, and description.

q: How fast is delivery?
a: We aim for quick delivery; timelines vary by location and order. Exact ETA appears at checkout.

q: Is there a delivery fee?
a: Delivery charges may vary by location and order value. The final fee is shown at checkout.

q: My order is delayed. What should I do?
a: Please contact customer support with your order ID for assistance.

q: How can I contact support?
a: Use the Contact page to chat, email, or call our support team.

q: Is expert health consultation available?
a: Yes. You can request a free health consultation for general guidance.

q: Where can I find the Privacy Policy?
a: You can find the Privacy Policy from the footer or the policies section.

q: How are complaints handled?
a: Please raise a ticket via the Contact/Support page. We aim for quick resolution.

q: How do I create an account?
a: Use the account icon or Sign Up option to register with your details.

q: I forgot my password. What should I do?
a: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login page to reset it.

q: How do I view my past orders?
a: Go to your account dashboard and open the Orders section.

q: Do you have health blogs?
a: Yes. Visit the Blogs section for health topics and tips.

q: Where can I see the latest blog posts?
a: Open the Blogs page and sort or filter by latest.

q: Are there any offers or discounts?
a: Check the Offers section on the homepage or menu for current deals.

q: How do I apply an offer code?
a: Enter the coupon code at checkout. Valid offers will apply automatically.

q: Are products safe and approved?
a: We list products from trusted suppliers that meet safety standards.

q: Should I consult a doctor before taking medicines?
a: For medical decisions, please consult a qualified professional. Our content is informational only.

q: Do you have a disclaimer?
a: Yes. Information provided is general and not a substitute for professional medical advice.

q: What is your return and refund policy?
a: Please refer to the Returns/Refunds policy page or contact support for assistance.

q: How can I cancel my order?
a: Contact support with your order ID. Cancellations depend on order status and policy.

q: Is there a minimum order value?
a: Minimum order value may apply in some regions. The requirement is shown at checkout.

q: Do you offer Cash on Delivery (COD)?
a: COD availability depends on location and order category. Check at checkout.

q: How long do refunds take?
a: Refund timelines depend on the payment method and bank. We initiate refunds promptly after approval.

q: Which prescription formats are accepted?
a: We accept clear photos or PDFs of valid prescriptions as per policy.

q: How long is a prescription valid?
a: Validity depends on local regulations and prescription type. Please follow your doctor's advice.

q: Can I get a GST invoice?
a: Yes. You can download your invoice from the order details in your account.

q: Can I change my address after placing the order?
a: Address changes are possible only before dispatch. Please contact support quickly.

q: Can I reschedule the delivery?
a: Rescheduling depends on the courier and order status. Contact support to check options.

q: Will I receive order confirmation by email or SMS?
a: Yes. We send order confirmations and key updates to your registered contact details.

q: What is your contact number?
a: Our helpline is +91 94531 31234 for orders and support.

q: What is your support email?
a: Email us at support@evermeds.in. We usually reply within 24 hours.

q: Do you provide WhatsApp support?
a: Yes. Message us on WhatsApp at +91 94531 31234 for quick queries.

q: Where are you located?
a: We are based in Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh, and we deliver pan-India.

q: Do you deliver in Gorakhpur?
a: Yes, we deliver in Gorakhpur and nearby areas, along with pan-India deliveries.

q: Is store pickup available in Gorakhpur?
a: If you prefer pickup, please contact support to check availability in Gorakhpur.

q: What are your support hours?
a: Service is online 24/7. Phone & WhatsApp support: 9 AM–8 PM IST.

q: What is your office address?
a: We are based in Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh. For the full address, please see the Contact page.

q: Can I email my prescription or order?
a: Yes. You can email your valid prescription and order details to support@evermeds.in.
